scripts.dev: concurrently "turbo dev" "inkeep dev" "sleep 3 && open http://localhost:3000" --names "APIs,UI,Browser" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" --success first
scripts.code-review: npm run lint:all && npm run type-check:all && npm run test:all
scripts.lint:all: cd frontend/contractor-map && npm run lint && cd ../../backend && npm run lint || true
scripts.type-check:all: cd frontend/contractor-map && npm run type-check || true
